mean_cn: v.定居，安顿；结束（争论）；解决（纠纷）；调停
mean_en: to make yourself or somebody else comfortable in a new position; to put something carefully in a position so that it does not move; to become or make somebody/something become calm or relaxed The baby wouldn't settle.
sentence: He built himself a house and decided to settle there.
sentence_trans: 他给自己建了一所房子，并决定在那里安顿下来。
